1: -module(weather_controller_SUITE).
    2: -include("weather.hrl").
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl"). %% For assertion macros
    5: 
    6: -export([ coastal_case/1
    7:         , inland_case/1
    8:         , northern_case/1
    9:         , southern_case/1]).
   10: 
   11: -export([ all/0
   12:         , init_per_testcase/2
   13:         , end_per_testcase/2]).
   14: 
   15: all() -> [ coastal_case
   16:          , inland_case
   17:          , northern_case
   18:          , southern_case].
   19: 
   20: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   21:   Time = gen_server_mock:start_global(time, time, strict),
   22:   StartTime = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(calendar:local_time()),
   23:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, StartTime),
   24:   Config ++ [ {time, Time}
   25:             , {startTime, StartTime}
   26:             , {updateInterval, 5}].
   27: 
   28: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   29:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
   30:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(Time)),
   31:   gen_server_mock:stop(Time),
   32:   Config.
   33: 
   34: coastal_case(Config) ->
   35:   run_test(Config, coastal).
   36: 
   37: inland_case(Config) ->
   38:   run_test(Config, inland).
   39: 
   40: northern_case(Config) ->
   41:   run_test(Config, northern).
   42: 
   43: southern_case(Config) ->
   44:   run_test(Config, southern).
   45: 
   46: run_test(Config, Type) ->
   47:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
   48:   StartTime = ?config(startTime, Config),
   49:   UpdateInterval = ?config(updateInterval, Config),
   50:   {ok, Supervisor} = client_supervisor:start_link(city, Type, UpdateInterval),
   51:   [{weather_controller, Pid, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Supervisor),
   52:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(Time, {?SUBSCRIBE, {{weather_controller, weather_controller}, Pid}, false, Pid}),
   53:   lists:map(fun(Delta) ->
   54:               CurrentTime = StartTime + Delta,
   55:               weather_controller:?NEW_TIME(Pid, CurrentTime, true),
   56:               {calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(CurrentTime), weather_controller:?GET_TYPE(), weather_controller:?GET_TEMP()}
   57:             end, lists:seq(60*60*24, 60*60*24*365, 60*60*24)).
